price: Kuma a lõkacin da wani Littãfi daga wurin Allah ya je musu, mai gaskatãwa ga abin da yake tãre da su, alhãli kuwa sun kasance daga gabãnin haka suna fãtar taimako* da shi a kan waɗanda suka kãfirta. To, a lõkacin da abin da suka sani ya je musu, sai suka kãfirta da shi. Sabõda haka la'anar Allah ta tabbata a kan kãfirai.
arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ كِتَٰبٞ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ مُصَدِّقٞ لِّمَا مَعَهُمۡ وَكَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ يَسۡتَفۡتِحُونَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم مَّا عَرَفُواْ كَفَرُواْ بِهِۦۚ فَلَعۡنَةُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: * Sunã cewa idan Annabin ƙarshen zãmaninsa ya zo, zã su yãƙi kãfiran Lãrabãwa da shi. Sunã zaton a cikinsu zai ɓullo. Sai ya fito a cikin Lãrabãwan.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
